com.paypal.selion.platform.grid

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.platform.grid.Grid

  • public final class Grid
extends Object
    Utility class making it easy to write tests based on Selenium WebDriver in a multi-thread context.

      • getRunOnLocalRC

        public static boolean getRunOnLocalRC()
        runOnLocalRC()
        Returns:
        localRC, Seleniuum run local if localRC=true, Selenium will run remote if localRC=false example: Grid.runOnLocalRC()
